* Building\_O

Building\_O
===========

The Building Department, also known as the Division of Inspections, is dedicated to safeguarding the health, safety, and welfare of Brick Township's residents. This mission is carried out by the Construction Official and Subcode Officials, who review construction permit applications to ensure that building plans and specifications comply with the New Jersey Uniform Construction Code (NJUCC). Inspectors conduct field inspections of construction projects to verify compliance with the NJUCC.  
  
The Division of Inspections is responsible for issuing permits for constructing, enlarging, altering, renovating, removing, or repairing structures.

If you are requesting general information regarding; what is needed to submit an application, status of an existing permit application, results of an inspection, or the status of a request for a Certificate, please contact this office by leaving a voice message at 732-262-4604 or by email at [Permitstatus@twp.brick.nj.us](mailto:Permitstatus@twp.brick.nj.us). Provide as much detail as you can on the nature of your inquiry to facilitate a quick response.

  
**Please find the recently updated  Township of Brick  2024 Mercantile License Application here:**[Mercantile License Form](https://www.bricknj.gov/Documents/Department/Building/Mercantile-License-Form-Final-2.pdf?t=202502250918000)  
  
[![SDLPortal](https://www.bricknj.gov/images/Department/Building/SDLPortal.jpg?t=202504240938520)](https://www.sdlportal.com/login?redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sdlportal.com%2Ftowns%2Fnj%2Focean%2Fbricktwp)OFFICE HOURS: Monday through Friday, 8am – 4pm  
VALUABLE LINKS & INFORMATION

* [New Jersey Adopted Construction Code](http://www.state.nj.us/dca/divisions/codes/codreg/#3)
* [Township of Brick Construction Fee Ordinance](http://ecode360.com/6896803#6896803)

[CONSTRUCTION PERMIT RELATED FORMS](https://www.bricknj.gov/departments/construction_permit_related_forms.php)
